divs: Sighting Detailsflying from el paso to DWf roughly 15 to 30 minutes after take off..looking down at the terrain towards NM i spotted 2 red, round objects{balls} 1 larger then the other, shoot past. they seemed to be in a perfect straight line and stayed the same distance apart relative to each other. sometimes you see cables accross rivers with balls on them, that was my first thought. but we had to be several thousand feet high by then, and there are no rivers there. the red balls flew past at a very high rate of speed, almost like when you see a shooting star. i noticed a lake below later[not sure how long after spotting balls], that i think is red bluff reservoir after looking at a map when i got home. so i guess that our flight path was close to a straight line from elpaso to slightly south of the reservoir. somewhere between i spotted the objects. cant explain....UFO
trends: there have been 18 other sightings in cms\tg n\a
there were 2 other sightings in cms\tg n\a on or around february 19th 2008
Summary: spotted 2 red, round object from plane
